refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: bwish is a Tcl/Tk-based interactive shell for BRL-CAD. It supports graphical user interface capabilities provided by Tk and includes command-line editing and history functionality. It is particularly suited for interactive scripting and development tasks in BRL-CAD.
The shell initializes and integrates Tcl/Tk libraries along with BRL-CAD-specific commands and extensions, enabling users to execute scripts or interact with the system.

listitem.para: Executes the provided Tcl script file and exits.
